apple_vendor_description: As depicted on Apple devices, this emoji features a woman with a beautiful, dark skin tone and a cascade of voluminous, curly hair.  Appleâ€™s design language brings her to life with vibrant colors and soft, rounded contours, while realistic lighting adds a natural sheen to her curls.  Her expression is often serene or confident, embodying strength and individuality, and is frequently used to represent women of diverse backgrounds, natural beauty, or personal style.
